infos.value: Truststones can be used to enhance Trust Master equipment items.
Truststones are an excellent way to improve your party's potential in battle.
Create powerful Truststones and turn your Trust Master equipment into unique items!

◆ Truststones ◆
Special items that enhance Trust Master equipment by engraving them with inscriptions.

◆ Enhancing Truststones ◆
By spending materials and Gil, it is possible to enhance stats, forge Truststones, and synergize the powers of Truststones.

◆ Forging ◆
Truststones can be obtained by forging
them from Truststone shards.
The type and powers of the Truststone are
determined at the time of forging.

◆ Dismantling ◆
You can spend Gil to dismantle unneeded Truststones into shards.

◆ Enhancing Trust Master Equipment ◆
Set a Truststone to a Trust Master equipment item
to enhance its stats and add extra abilities.

◆ Truststone Slots ◆
A slot must be unlocked before it can hold a Truststone. Slots can also be enhanced in order to hold Truststones of higher rarity.

◆ Truststone Types ◆
Truststones come in different types. The powers of a Truststone vary according to the type.

◆ Set Bonuses ◆
Sometimes, setting Truststones of the same type can further enhance the effects they provide.
